title: M'eza (preview for an interactive installation)
creator_credit: Anita Bacic and Advanced Diploma of Multimedia (ADoM), Swinburne University of Technology (formerly Electronic Design and Interactive Media (EDIM)
brief_description: As part of the end of year screening for the Swinburne, EDIM (Electronic Design and Interactive Media) course - those students who had completed interactive coursework were required to create a linear representation of their work for the showreel. M’eza is an immersive art-piece screened at Videobrasil Electronic Art festival 2003. Artist should be contacted at a later date for a further explanation of the work
